live_updates: Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution. Thank you for your patience.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
29080.summary: Some customers in the South Calgary & Bankview areas of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
29080.title: Nov 15 – Calgary (South Calgary & Bankview) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
